column1: Kata Robata////Absolutely adore this place. Ate here almost every week when I lived in Houston and still go when I visit. Perfect ambiance for date night. I've never received bad service here just be sure to reserve on the weekends because it does it get super busy. The wagyu skewers
column2: lobster mac and cheese and lychee martinis are amazing. I'm a sushi snob and they always deliver the best!!  Cheers :D
